    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public static Planet newInstance​(int width,
                                 int height)
        Static factory method to create a new instance of a planet.
        Parameters:
        width - it.zanifabio.rover.Planet width (number of points on the x axis)
        height - it.zanifabio.rover.Planet height (number of points on the y axis)
        Returns:
        A new instance of the planet with the given height and width, without any obstacle.

      • isOutOfBounds

        public boolean isOutOfBounds​(int x,
                             int y)

      • placeObstacle

        public void placeObstacle​(int x,
                          int y)
        Method to place an obstacle on the planet.
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate of the obstacle. it must be between 0 and width - 1
        y - Y coordinate of the obstacle. it must be between 0 and height - 1

      • removeObstacle

        public void removeObstacle​(int x,
                           int y)
        Method to remove a specific obstacle form the planet.
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate of the obstacle. it must be between 0 and width - 1
        y - Y coordinate of the obstacle. it must be between 0 and height - 1

      • placeObstacles

        public void placeObstacles​(java.util.Set<Coordinate> coordinates)
        Method to place multiple obstacles on the planet.
        Parameters:
        coordinates - Set of coordinates representing the various obstacles. All coordinates must pertain to the planet.

      • removeObstacles

        public void removeObstacles​(java.util.Set<Coordinate> coordinates)
        Method to remove multiple obstacles on the planet.
        Parameters:
        coordinates - Set of coordinates representing the various obstacles. All coordinates must pertain to the planet.

      • removeObstacles

        public void removeObstacles()
        Method to remove all the obstacles form the planet.
